Package io.ib67.astralflow.item.builder

Interface ItemCategory<I>

Type Parameters:
I - The type of item this category is for.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArmorCategory, BaseCategory, DummyCategory, MachineCategory, WeaponCategory
@AvailableSince("0.1.0") public interface ItemCategory<I>
A category of items.
This class defines how ItemPrototypeFactorys are created from your custom item types.
See WeaponCategory for an example.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ItemPrototypeFactory
    getFactory(I item)
    Produces an ItemPrototypeFactory for the given item, which will be registered into ItemRegistry
